Nightlight::

Nighlight shot  25 energyballs against Stranato. Termitron took off 
before Train Wreck and fired 25 times against him.

"NOOOOOOOOOO!!!!" Shouted WIndlord when he saw Airbomber attack 
Linzyx and he fired two missiles one against Airbonber and other to 
Deemos



--- In nbwrpg@y..., "Soulstice Omega" <thecode@p...> wrote:
> Stranato was hit by the energy balls and laughed. But then, he was 
slashed
> in the back and went down to his knees. Train Wreck, seeing this, 
aimed
> perfectly at Termitron and charged him in train mode, trying to run 
him
> over. Airbomber ran up and fired 8 quick semi-automatic shots at 
Lynxiz.
> Deemos fired 3 shots at Windlord and helped Stranato back up.
> 
> Meanwhile, Arrow charged through the base, trying to find Perplex. 
He finds
> him.
> 
> Arrow: Get your ass out here.
> 
> Arrow returns to the battlefield. Perplex follows him this time...
>

circles

left
